title: Anacardium occidentale
Vernacular name: English- Cashew nut </br> Hindi- Kaju </br> Gujarati- Kaju </br> Sanskrit- Agnikrita, Arushkara </br>
Chemical Constituents: ascorbic acid, thiamine, riboflavin, and niacin
Therapeutic uses: Used as treatment for reducing fever, malaria, toothache, and gum problems
